data.title: Thrilled to announce Ebenezer Bond as a speaker for the Hospitality 3.0 Symposium! @ebenezer007 is the Co-founder and CEO of @studiolisto...
data.meta_description:
188 likes, 8 comments - meta_foundation on April 24, 2024: "Thrilled to announce Ebenezer Bond as a speaker for the Hospitality 3.0 Symposium! 

@ebenezer007 is the Co-founder and CEO of @studiolisto , a studio that is part marketing agency and part venture partner. His expertise lies in brand positioning, brand strategy and growth advisory, with a focus on creating innovative marketing campaigns that blend digital and physical experiences.

The Hospitality 3.0 Symposium will inspire conversations and co-create solutions to address ecological, social, and cultural challenges through a new understanding of hospitality across sectors such as #travel, #education, #entertainment, #wellness, #workplace, and #retail.

Use the H3S_COMMUNITY discount code for our special community rate.

Learn more about the Symposium using the link in bio.".
